page.title: 11Oldmeldrum Sports & Leisure
page.content: By contrast with many towns which rely on local government or Social Services departments to provide leisure activities, Oldmeldrum has a long tradition of running its own. In addition to the long list of social clubs in the town, the sports groups include the Meldrum and Bourtie Tennis Club, the Golf Club, the soccer and rugby club, the badminton club and the rifle club. There are several dozen squash players in the town who use the facilities of the Garioch Squash Club, in Inverurie. Leisure activities include aerobic dancing, the Keep Fit class and the yoga group. The Town Hall in the centre of town provides a meeting place for some activities and the local primary school gymnasium for others. All the active sports, save squash, have pitches, courts and greens around the Pleasure Park.
